short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Roblox Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Roblox background. Roblox wallpaper background themes created for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically change your Roblox wallpaper with each new tab opening.
2. Easily randomize your Roblox background or mark it as a favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Utilize a Google-powered search bar for convenient searches.
4. Swiftly access your email and social media accounts.
5. Display the current date and time seamlessly.
6. Create new notes to keep track of your tasks.
7. Effortlessly reach your most frequently visited websites.
8. Access your bookmarks with ease.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Quickly navigate to Google apps.
11. Instant access to a variety of additional themes.
12. Share content effortlessly on social media platforms.
13. Swiftly download wallpapers with a dedicated access point.
14. Conveniently access and play games.
15. Enhance your Roblox new tab experience with entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks.
